Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Replacement
Synopsis Set the value of an Annotation.
Syntax Exp1[@Name = Exp2]
Description Expression that sets the value of annotation Name of the value Exp1 to the value of Exp2 and returns the value with the new annotation value as result. See Selection for selecting the value of an annotation.
Examples 
rascal>anno str node @ color;
PROFILE: 0 data points, 0 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
ok
rascal>anno str node @ size;
PROFILE: 1 data points, 1 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       1   100.0%  |prompt:///|(0,22,<1,0>,<1,22>
ok
rascal>F = "fn"(123, "abc");
PROFILE: 3 data points, 3 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       1    33.3%  |prompt:///|(14,5,<1,14>,<1,19
prompt:///          1       1    33.3%  |prompt:///|(4,4,<1,4>,<1,8>):
prompt:///          1       1    33.3%  |prompt:///|(0,21,<1,0>,<1,21>
PROFILE: 3 data points, 3 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       1    33.3%  |prompt:///|(14,5,<1,14>,<1,19
prompt:///          1       1    33.3%  |prompt:///|(4,4,<1,4>,<1,8>):
prompt:///          1       1    33.3%  |prompt:///|(0,21,<1,0>,<1,21>
node: fn(123,"abc")
rascal>F = F[@color="red"];
PROFILE: 2 data points, 4 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       2    50.0%  |prompt:///|(13,5,<1,13>,<1,18
prompt:///          1       2    50.0%  |prompt:///|(0,20,<1,0>,<1,20>
PROFILE: 2 data points, 4 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       2    50.0%  |prompt:///|(13,5,<1,13>,<1,18
prompt:///          1       2    50.0%  |prompt:///|(0,20,<1,0>,<1,20>
node: fn(123,"abc")[
  @color="red"
]
rascal>F = F[@size="10"];
PROFILE: 2 data points, 3 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       2    66.7%  |prompt:///|(0,18,<1,0>,<1,18>
prompt:///          1       1    33.3%  |prompt:///|(12,4,<1,12>,<1,16
PROFILE: 2 data points, 3 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       2    66.7%  |prompt:///|(0,18,<1,0>,<1,18>
prompt:///          1       1    33.3%  |prompt:///|(12,4,<1,12>,<1,16
node: fn(123,"abc")[
  @color="red",
  @size="10"
]
rascal>F@color;

 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       4   100.0%  |prompt:///|(0,8,<1,0>,<1,8>):
